movies.title: ER Simulation
movies.plot_summary: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets from their subconscious.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot_summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot_summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot_summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot_summary: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham. The Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot_summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot_summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot_summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
